structuredJobpost.title: Lead Talent Acquisition Partner
structuredJobpost.description: You will provide strategic leadership in building and maintaining a high-performing team for our Corporate hiring. You will develop and execute comprehensive talent acquisition strategies for our Corporate business groups that are aligned with organizational goals. You will partner with our Senior Leaders in Corporate to create data-driven approaches to reaching our hiring goals. You will manage and develop an effective team, providing exceptional communication, leadership, guidance, and resources aligned with our policies, and applicable laws and regulations. You will lead, mentor, and inspire a high-performing talent acquisition team, fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation. You will build and maintain strong relationships with Senior and Executive Leaders in Corporate, ensuring you capture regular feedback on hiring and team performance. You will develop, analyze and report on key recruiting performance metrics and measurements to garner key insights into pipeline health, hiring performance, and candidate satisfaction. You will lead the end-to-end recruitment process for our most senior positions in Corporate from sourcing potential candidates to conducting interviews, due diligence, and extending employment offers. You will stay abreast of recruiting trends, best practices, legal developments, and technological advancements in the web3 space.

Manage and develop an effective team
Lead, mentor, and inspire a high-performing talent acquisition team
Day to day management of direct reports
Build and maintain strong relationships with Senior and Executive Leaders in Corporate
Be strategic partner in hiring
Develop, analyze and report on key recruiting performance metrics
Cultivate and maintain positive relationships with leadership, potential candidates and existing staff
Lead the end-to-end recruitment process for our most senior positions in Corporate
Collaborate with Leads to comprehend each business group's unique needs
Identify team and recruiting KPIs specific to Corporate hiring
Stay abreast of recruiting trends, best practices, legal developments, and technological advancements in the web3 space
Utilize data-driven insights to develop and report on key talent acquisition metrics
Capacity planning
Lead, contribute, or execute on various strategic projects as part of the Talent Leadership team

structuredJobpost.description: As the Head of Business Development at Streamflow, you'll spearhead the expansion and consolidation of our BD team, driving a dynamic ecosystem-centric strategy. Your leadership will be pivotal in fostering hyper-growth and leadership of token distribution across multiple chains. Define and execute BD strategies and Go-To-Market (GTM) plans for respective ecosystems, leveraging market insights to drive growth. Champion the complete lifecycle of sales, ensuring client satisfaction and long-term relationships. Establish scalable processes to streamline BD operations and maintain a robust sales pipeline. Demonstrate a deep understanding of DeFi ecosystems, particularly on-chain primitives on highly performant L1s, and keep abreast of the latest trends and developments. Engage with the crypto community across platforms like Twitter, Telegram, and Discord, contributing to and staying ahead of the current meta. Display a commitment to the company's long-term vision, with a minimum availability of one year, and align with Streamflow's vision to become the default multi-chain distribution layer. Facilitate cross-team communication, influencing product and company strategy with insights from sales operations. Adaptability is key, as you'll be expected to wear multiple hats and contribute to various aspects of the business. Embrace networking opportunities by attending conferences and events, leveraging your extroverted nature to foster connections. Possess the ability to understand and effectively communicate technical aspects of blockchain products to diverse audiences.

Champion the complete lifecycle of sales

You will collaborate with development teams to design solutions that prioritize customer experience, scalability, and performance. You will analyze system performance and reliability to provide enhancement recommendations. You will establish and maintain service-level objectives (SLOs), service-level indicators (SLIs), and error budgets. You will implement and advocate for Security Best Practices.
